MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 09-DEC-2020 11:30.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the G11 postcode area of Glasgow, affecting properties in White Street and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have carried out a fuse replacement at Stewartville Street substation and now require further investigations onsite and we now expect your supply to be restored by 11.30am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.43am on Wednesday 9th December 2020.
